title: Website Not Loading
description: The homepage of the website is stuck on a white screen after the latest update.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Users are not receiving the password reset email, causing them to be locked out of their accounts.

title: Bug in Checkout Process
description: The 'Apply Discount Code' button on the checkout page is not functioning, leading to customer frustration.

title: Incorrect Order Total
description: The final total on the order summary page is incorrect after taxes are applied. It's showing an extra $5.

title: Live Chat Widget Missing
description: The live chat support widget has disappeared from the bottom right corner of the website.

title: Can't Upload Profile Picture
description: Users are getting an 'upload failed' error when trying to change their profile picture on their account settings page.

title: Broken Link in Footer
description: The 'Privacy Policy' link in the website footer is leading to a 404 page.

title: Video Playback Issues
description: Videos on the product tutorial page are buffering constantly or not playing at all for many users.

title: Search Bar Not Functioning
description: The search functionality on the website is not returning any results, even for common keywords.

title: Subscription Billing Error
description: Customers are being charged twice for their monthly subscription and are receiving duplicate invoices.

title: Typo on About Us Page
description: There is a spelling mistake in the second paragraph of the 'About Us' section. The word 'commited' should be 'committed'.

title: Email Subscription Form Issues
description: The email signup form on the landing page is not capturing new subscribers. No new emails are being added to the mailing list.

title: Mobile Layout is Broken
description: The website layout is not responsive on mobile devices; text and images are overlapping and hard to read.

title: Account Deletion Request
description: I need my account and all associated data to be permanently deleted from your system.

title: Feedback Form Submission Failure
description: When users try to submit the feedback form, they get a 'server error' message and the form does not send.
